azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureMetrics
| where * contains("ehn")
| where MetricName == "INREQS"
| sort by TimeGenerated
| project Average, TimeGenerated

AzureMetrics
| where * contains("ehn")
| where MetricName == "IncomingBytes"
| sort by TimeGenerated

AzureMetrics
| where * contains ("ehn")
| where MetricName == "OUTMSGS"
| sort by TimeGenerated

AzureMetrics
| where * contains tostring("ehn")
| where MetricName == "EHOUTMBS"
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

AzureMetrics
| where * contains tostring("ehn")
| where MetricName == "EHOUTMBS"
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

AppMetrics
    | where Name has "AvgDurationMs" and * contains tolower("$ManagedResourceGroup")
    | project Min, Max, Sum, TimeGenerated

AppPerformanceCounters
    | where Name == '% Processor Time' and * contains tolower("$ManagedResourceGroup")
    | project Value, TimeGenerated

AzureMetrics
| where * contains tostring("StorageAccount")
| where MetricName == "IoReadOperationsPerSecond"

AzureMetrics
| where * contains tostring("StorageAccount")
| where MetricName == "UsedCapacity"
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

AzureMetrics
| where * contains tostring("StorageAccount")
| where MetricName == "UsedCapacity"
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

AzureMetrics
| where * contains tostring("StorageAccount")
| where MetricName == "UsedCapacity"
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources 
| where  parse_json(properties).applicationDefinitionId like ('Managed-ScaleUnit') 
| where name != "scaleunit37"
| project name

azureLogAnalytics.query:
Resources
| where type == "microsoft.solutions/applications"
| where resourceGroup == split("$scaleUnit", "/")[0] and name ==  split("$scaleUnit", "/")[1
| project parse_json(properties).managedResourceGroupId

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type == "microsoft.solutions/applications"
| where parse_json(properties).applicationDefinitionId contains ("$managedApp") and name == "$scaleUnit"
| project p = split(parse_json(properties).managedResourceGroupId,"/")[4]
| project substring(p,0)

Resources
| where tolower(resourceGroup) == tolower("$ManagedResourceGroup")
| where type == "microsoft.eventhub/namespaces"
| project name

Resources
| where tolower(resourceGroup) == tolower("$ManagedResourceGroup")
| where type == "microsoft.web/sites"
| project name

Resources
| where tolower(resourceGroup) == tolower("$ManagedResourceGroup")
| where type == "microsoft.storage/storageaccounts"
| project name
